Event.name: Visiting
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> matches location with an <fen>Entity</fen> in order to fulfill some <fen>Purpose</fen>.
Quite often, the <fen>Purpose</fen> is social- or entertainment-oriented.
<ex>I ca n't remember how many times <fex name="Agent">he</fex> <t>visited</t> ! <fex name="Entity">DNI</fex></ex> <ex><fex name="Time">Now</fex> <fex name="Agent">she</fex> <ment>was</ment> <ment>on</ment> an <fex name="Purpose">inspection</fex> <t>visit</t> .</ex> <ex><fex name="Agent">You</fex> have to <t>visit</t> <fex name="Entity">your parents</fex> <fex name="Frequency">every once in a while</fex> .</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition: <def-root>The sentient entity that is temporarily with the <fen>Entity</fen> in order to fulfil some <fen>Purpose</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Entity
Arg.definition: <def-root>The physical entity that is permanently associated with entities or characteristics that the <fen>Agent</fen> wishes to use for some <fen>Purpose</fen>. During the visit, the <fen>Agent</fen> matches location with the <fen>Entity</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Dependent_state
Arg.definition: <def-root>A state (of the <fen>Agent</fen>) that results as a consequence of the <fen>Agent</fen> being situated at the <fen>Entity</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The activity that is enabled by the <fen>Entity</fen> and that the <fen>Agent</fen> wishes to achieve.</def-root>

Arg.name: Normal_location
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location that the <fen>Agent</fen> normally resides in or is (permanently) associated with.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The time at which a visit is made.</def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>The amount of time that the <fen>Agent</fen> spends with the <fen>Entity</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any overall description of the details of the visit, either in terms of how it matches other events (<ment>the same way</ment>) or in terms of states of the <fen>Agent</fen> that affect the action.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>A description of the position of the <fen>Agent</fen> during the visit.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>An action of the <fen>Agent</fen> that enables their visit.</def-root>

Arg.name: Iterations
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The number of instances of the described event.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Frequency
Arg.definition: <def-root>A characterization of the average number of times a visit happens over a period of time.</def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root>A description of the state of <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Entity</fen> during the action.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: visitor.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a person visiting a person or place, especially socially.

lexUnit.name: visit.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: go to see and spend some time with (someone) socially or as a guest.

lexUnit.name: revisit.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: come back to or visit again.
